title: Set 'Samaj Ki Seva Mein Samarpит' stat counter to zero

requirements.text: In the AboutSection (or whichever section displays the stat/counter for 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' — 'Dedicated to Social Service'), set its numeric value to 0 (zero) for now.

quotes: समाज की सेवा में समर्पित को अभी के लिये जीरो रखे

acceptanceCriteria: The stat card or counter labeled 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' (or equivalent) displays 0 as its value.
No other stat values or UI elements are changed.
The change is visible on the live page without requiring a data refresh.

constraints: Only change the value of the 'समाज की सेवा में समर्पित' stat to 0; do not modify any other stats or content.
nonGoals: Adding backend persistence for this stat value.
Modifying the ServicesSection or any other component.
